sentences.en: He whacked me on the back and I held both his arms.
sentences.cn: 他用力拍拍我的背,我抱住他的双臂.

sentences.en: He whacked the little boy for talking back.
sentences.cn: 他为了那小男孩顶嘴而用力打他.

sentences.en: His mother was murdered. Yeah, she got whacked. Snuffed out.
sentences.cn: 他母亲是被谋杀的。是的，是被人干掉的，弄死的。

sentences.en: His thoughts are whacked, he's mad so he's talkin back.
sentences.cn: 他的思想受到沉重的打击, 他非常生气,他开始顶嘴.

sentences.en: His thoughts are whacked, he's mad so he's talkin'back.
sentences.cn: 他的想法很疯狂, 他怒火中烧,所以他开始反击.

sentences.en: I even got the hoIe in his head where I whacked him with a 9 - iron.
sentences.cn: 那个我在他脑袋上留下个熨斗窟窿的托尼.

sentences.en: I was whacked, and by 7:00, I was fast asleep.
sentences.cn: 我累了, 到了7点, 我就熟睡了.

sentences.en: Karen hauled off and whacked him in the arm.
sentences.cn: 凯伦将他拖了起来,重重地打了他的肩膀.

sentences.en: She whacked him with her handbag.
sentences.cn: 她用手提包狠狠地打他。

sentences.en: Someone whacked him on the head.
sentences.cn: 有人狠狠地打了他的头。
那个姑娘一定是疯掉了.

sentences.en: The bully whacked my brother with a stick.
sentences.cn: 那恶棍用棒头狠揍我兄弟.

sentences.en: They whacked up the $ 3,000,000 profit among themselves.
We got whacked. On paper we should have wiped the floor with them.
sentences.cn: 我们被轻易地击败了。按理说我们本应该大败他们。

words.tran_cn: 重击的人；异常巨大的东西；弥天大谎
疲惫不堪的，精疲力竭的

phrases.tran_cn: 不正常；不一致；（美口）紊乱

trans.tran_cn: 重击，使劲打( whack的过去式和过去分词 )
